#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
#include<ctype.h>
int main()
{
    int t,k,i,count;
    char s[201];
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%s",s);
        k=strlen(s);
        count=k-4;
        for(i=4;i<=k-5;i++)
        {
            //if(isupper(s[i])) s[i]=tolower(s[i]);
            if(s[i]=='a'||s[i]=='e'||s[i]=='i'||s[i]=='o'||s[i]=='u') count--;
        }
        printf("%d/%d\n",count,k);
    }
    return 0;
}
